## SimpleUser.sendDTMF() method

Send DTMF.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
sendDTMF(tone: string): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  tone | <code>string</code> | Tone to send. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<void>`

## Remarks

Send an INFO request with content type application/dtmf-relay.
